title: "Deep Longevity publishes an epigenetic aging clock of unprecedented accuracy"
excerpt: "Longevity startup ''Deep Longevity'' has released a new high-accuracy methylation aging clock -- DeepMAge. It is a neural network that was trained and verified in a collection of >6,000 blood samples from 32 studies."
